scripts.api-docs:build: ./node_modules/raml2html/bin/raml2html --validate --theme raml2html-werk-theme --input www/api/docs.raml --output www/api/docs-tmp.html && cat www/api/docs-tmp.html | sed -e 's/<\/head>/<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"\.\/assets\/docs_custom\.css\"><\/head>/' > www/api/docs.html && rm www/api/docs-tmp.html
